mcq.statement: What was the main objective of the movement started by some prominent Hindus of Banaras in 1867 regarding the court language?

options.b: Replacement of Urdu by Hindi written in Nagiri script
options.c: Adoption of English as court language

mcq.one_liner: The main objective of the 1867 movement by prominent Hindus of Banaras was the replacement of **Urdu by Hindi written in the Nagiri script** as the court language in North Western Provinces.

suggestions.topic: Services of Sir Syed Ahmad Khan (1817-1898)
